title: Add Admin Panel link to hamburger menu

requirements.summary: Add an 'Admin Panel' link/button inside the hamburger (mobile) menu in the Header component, visible only to authenticated admin users
acceptanceCriteria: When the hamburger menu is open on mobile, an 'Admin Panel' button/link appears in the menu list.
The Admin Panel button is only visible to users who are authenticated as admin (same role check used for the desktop header button).
Clicking the Admin Panel button in the hamburger menu opens the admin panel and closes the mobile menu.
Non-admin and unauthenticated users do not see the Admin Panel option in the hamburger menu.
The button styling is consistent with the rest of the hamburger menu items.

file_operations.description: Add an 'Admin Panel' button inside the mobile hamburger menu navigation list, conditionally rendered using the same isAdmin check that controls the desktop admin panel button visibility. The button should call onAdminPanelOpen when clicked and close the mobile menu. Apply consistent styling with other mobile menu items and ensure proper Hindi translation if menu labels use Hindi.
